Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's not just a product; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its exceptional quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $80 to you. For a limited time, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to acquire it directly from me at this special price. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let's make this happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
